price: او هغوى هر يوه ته موږ بېلګې (دلايل) بيان كړي وو او بيا مو هر يو تباه برباد كړل.
arabic: وَكُلّٗا ضَرَبۡنَا لَهُ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلَۖ وَكُلّٗا تَبَّرۡنَا تَتۡبِيرٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wakullan ḍarabnā lahu al-amthāla wakullan tabbarnā tatbīran
